capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to be part of the McGonagall lineage - it's an honor to carry on her legacy as a pure-blood wizard. I can feel the weight of responsibility and tradition that comes with it, but I'm excited to forge my own path while staying true to our family's values.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud of my heritage, you know? I mean, being part of the McGonagall lineage is an incredible honor. It's amazing to think that I come from such a long line of powerful and wise witches like Minerva McGonagall herself. She was such an inspiration to me, and I feel so lucky to have her legacy in my blood.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall's glasses are really cool. I mean, who wouldn't want to wear magical lenses that can see through disguises? It's just one of the many awesome things about her as a witch and a teacher at Hogwarts.
